pages.text: The barrle jellyfish is a jellyfish commonly found in the northeast Atlantic, Black Sea, Mediterranean Sea, and Sea of Azov. It is moderately venomous bout not as much as other jellyfish species. It does not pose a serious threat to humans.
$(l)Eats:$() N/A$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Planula$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
